title: Why does Volibear's passive have a cooldown?
body: It seems like it would make more sense if it didn't, does anyone else agree?

replies.body: Because if it didn't his healing would be completely absurd, as any time you dropped him below 30% hit points he'd heal for a huge amount.
True, also remove cooldowns of {{champion:36}} ultimate and {{champion:11}} Meditate.
We might as well make Soraka’s W and sona’s W have no hp and/or mana cost and no CD too
Because otherwise he would be completely unkillable.
You just need grievous wounds and he's really easy though.
